text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering | 94% | stars now 4060 → est 8769 (range 8739-8799)
   https://github.com/muratcankoylan/Agent-Skills-for-Context-Engineering
2) pranshuparmar/witr | 92% | stars now 4304 → est 9035 (range 8994-9076)
   https://github.com/pranshuparmar/witr
3) bellard/mquickjs | 92% | stars now 4639 → est 11134 (range 11087-11181)
   https://github.com/bellard/mquickjs
4) productdevbook/port-killer | 90% | stars now 2635 → est 4498 (range 4466-4530)
   https://github.com/productdevbook/port-killer
5) abusoww/tuxmate | 88% | stars now 719 → est 2006 (range 1981-2031)
   https://github.com/abusoww/tuxmate

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
